Text:
Thanks!

I have been unable to connect...bgeen hit or miss for the past 2 weeks.

I think Comcast is blocking, even though they claim no to be doing so.

Friend of mine down the road with FIOS had no problems. If I log in from his house, no problems either.

Another friend with Comcast has had similar problems and he is 20 miles away! 

Going to start using a proxy maybe!
Brian: come to the IRC channel and I'll help you out.
OK. I appreciate the assist! Will have to learn IRC first. Never really tried it before. Never needed to. lol

PS - 
I am the same screen name on suprbay if that is an option. I can receive PMs there.
